items.description: includes choice of Fountain Beverage at time of purchase. Limit two (2) per person, per transaction. No discounts apply.

items.title: Smoked Barbecue Combo Platter
items.description: A selection of House-smoked Meats, with Baked Beans, Coleslaw, White Bread and Pickled Vegetables. Select 2: Pork Spareribs, Pulled Pork, Sausage Link, or Beef Brisket

items.description: with Coleslaw and Beer-battered Fries

items.title: Funnel Cake Fries

items.description: served with a Cuties® Mandarin Orange, Applesauce and choice of small DASANI® Water or small Lowfat Milk. Meets Disney Nutrition Guidelines for Complete Meals without substitutions

items.title: Sparkling Strawberry-Pickle Lemonade​

items.description: Simply Lemonade®, Minute Maid® Strawberry Smoothie, Sweet Cream Topping, Shortbread Crumbles & Strawberry Dust​

items.title: Lemonade-Iced Tea
items.description: Simply Lemonade®, Gold Peak® Unsweetened Iced Tea and a Lemon Wheel

items.title: Assorted Fountain Beverages - Regular
items.description: Coca-Cola®, Diet Coke®, Sprite®, Coca-Cola® Zero Sugar, Barq's® Root Beer, Fanta® Orange, Powerade® Mountain Berry Blast, Minute Maid® Zero Sugar, Gold Peak® Unsweetened Black Tea, Gold Peak® Sweet Tea

items.title: Assorted Fountain Beverages - Large
items.description: Coca-Cola®, Diet Coke®, Sprite®, Coca-Cola® Zero Sugar, Barq's® Root Beer, Fanta® Orange, Powerade® Mountain Berry Blast, Minute Maid® Zero Sugar, Gold Peak® Unsweetened Black Tea, Gold Peak® Sweet Tea

items.title: Mickey Mouse-shaped Glow Cube
items.description: Light-up your beverage. Limit ten (10) per person, per transaction.

items.title: Reusable Utensils
items.description: with purchase of food. Limit ten (10) per person, per transaction. No discounts apply.
